sentences.sContent: The latest fighting appears to be an attempt by each group to establish dominance over the other.
sentences.sCn: 最近的战斗似乎是冲突各方在试图争夺控制权。

words.tran: 显性的；占优势的；支配的，统治的
占主导地位的；强势的；占统治地位的；[数] 受控的
控制，支配；处于支配地位（dominate的过去式）
控制；支配；占优势；在…中占主要地位

trans.tranCn: 绝对优势； 支配地位， 统治地位
trans.tranOther: The dominance of a particular person or thing is the fact that they are more powerful, successful, or important than other people or things
